reviewText: My mother & I have long been obsessed with Dances With Wolves and luckily my children love it too. I got this today & watched it immediately. It was really very interesting & I would recommend it for any fans of the movie

If you are a Kevin Costner fan, then you will thoroughly enjoy this documentary on the making of Dances With Wolves.  Thank God for actors like Costner who are willing to follow their heart and conscience and not the Hollywood studios.
saw the documentary on TV and loved it. ordered this and it shipped fast

I've read the book, seen the movie probably 50 times. I love the story and found this documentary very insightful. I loved seeing all the characters speak of their experience and seeing unused clips and photos of the cast. Loved it
